channel.title: Help with stats and admin plz
channel.description: Hey when i set my rights to 3 i dont have a gold crown...niether do i on 2...and as for the stats i change them save it then turn on server and they reset themselves back to what they were before i edited them...plz help(btw using testscape...)

item.title: Help with stats and admin plz
item.dc:creator: @slipknotftw slipknotftw
item.description:
@slipknotftw wrote:

in client.java find

//start of moderator/ should see something like this

[code] //start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“OWNERNAMEHERE”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“nvi ible”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(""))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“roooony”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“base”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“pwnzor69”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“smitty”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“stoned4life1”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“lemonslayer”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“inuyasha”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“bdawgx”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“freespot”))
{
playerRights = 1;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“juggalo269”))
{
playerRights = 1;
}[/code]

Now in brackets with names delete the name and put your name in their with the player rights.

Thanks To Whoever made this tut

Read full topic
